name: part_008
file: tmp_【  #アキロゼ生誕祭2023 】ーStart your journeyー￤3DLIVE【ホロライブ】 [n-pNnnM2ERs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Song performance with multiple Hololive members.
Aki Rosenthal MC section, thanking the audience and guest performers.

subtitles.original: すごすぎる
subtitles.english: So amazing!

subtitles.original: そして君が知ってる 私が一番可愛いの
subtitles.english: And you know that I'm the cutest.

subtitles.original: 私もそれに気づいた
subtitles.english: I've realized that too.

subtitles.original: だから それ可愛い あれ可愛いなんて
subtitles.english: So, saying that this is cute or that is cute...

subtitles.original: 誰可愛い それ可愛いなんて
subtitles.english: Don't say that anyone or anything else is cute.

subtitles.original: 言わないで 私以外なんてやだ
subtitles.english: Don't say it. I don't want anyone but me.

subtitles.original: なんて ありえない
subtitles.english: That's impossible.

subtitles.original: 私 気づいちゃいました
subtitles.english: I just realized.

subtitles.original: 毎日何十回 褒められまくったお菓子は
subtitles.english: Sweets that get praised dozens of times a day...

subtitles.original: 昨日よりちょっと甘くなるって 前に聞いたような
subtitles.english: I think I heard they get a bit sweeter than yesterday.

subtitles.original: さすがにそれ なんか変だけど 私は言われたいタイプでして
subtitles.english: That's a bit strange, but I'm the type who wants to be told that.

subtitles.original: もっと分かりやすくていいんだよ お待ちしてます お願い
subtitles.english: It's okay to be more obvious. I'm waiting for it, please.

subtitles.original: 何してても どんな顔見せてても
subtitles.english: No matter what I'm doing or what face I'm making...

subtitles.original: いつも超キュートだって 確信してるのは
subtitles.english: The reason I'm so sure I'm always super cute is...

subtitles.original: なんだかさ 知らなかったタイプの運命のトビラ
subtitles.english: Because of a type of door to destiny I never knew.

subtitles.original: 見合ったりは無理 ごめん 逆にでも それより楽しいよ
subtitles.english: I can't look at you directly, sorry. But conversely, this is more fun.

subtitles.original: ねえ ねえ ねえ！
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey!

subtitles.original: 私の1番可愛いところをよく見てる
subtitles.english: You're looking closely at my cutest part.

subtitles.original: そんな君が本当に超ラッキーな人すぎる
subtitles.english: A person like you is truly way too lucky.

subtitles.original: そして君が何だって 想い合えるように
subtitles.english: So that we can love each other no matter what.

subtitles.original: 私はそれに気づいた
subtitles.english: I've realized that.

subtitles.original: 会えない時も どんな表情してるかとか
subtitles.english: Even when we can't meet, I wonder what expression you're making.

subtitles.original: 気持ち悪いくらい 想像しちゃうから
subtitles.english: Because I imagine it to a point that's almost creepy.

subtitles.original: それ可愛い あれ可愛いよって
subtitles.english: Say "that's cute," "this is cute."

subtitles.original: 本当に可愛いって言って
subtitles.english: Say it's really cute.

subtitles.original: 私の1番可愛いところに気づいてる
subtitles.english: You've noticed my cutest part.

subtitles.original: そんな君が1番すごいすごいよ すごすぎる
subtitles.english: You're the most amazing, amazing! So amazing!

subtitles.original: そして君が知ってる 私が一番可愛いの
subtitles.english: And you know that I'm the cutest.

subtitles.original: 私はそれに気づいた
subtitles.english: I've realized that.

subtitles.original: 私の1番可愛いところをよく見てる
subtitles.english: You're looking closely at my cutest part.

subtitles.original: そんな君が本当に超ラッキーな人すぎる
subtitles.english: A person like you is truly way too lucky.

subtitles.original: そして君が何だって 想い合えるように
subtitles.english: So that we can love each other no matter what.

subtitles.original: 私はそれに気づいた
subtitles.english: I've realized that.

subtitles.original: 私の1番可愛いところに気づいてる
subtitles.english: You've noticed my cutest part.

subtitles.original: そんな君が1番すごいすごいよ すごすぎる
subtitles.english: You're the most amazing, amazing! So amazing!

subtitles.original: そして君が知ってる 私が一番可愛いの
subtitles.english: And you know that I'm the cutest.

subtitles.original: 私もそれに気づいた
subtitles.english: I've realized that too.

subtitles.original: だから それ可愛い あれ可愛いなんて
subtitles.english: So, saying that this is cute or that is cute...

subtitles.original: 誰可愛い それ可愛いなんて
subtitles.english: Don't say that anyone or anything else is cute.

subtitles.original: 言わないで 私以外なんてやだ
subtitles.english: Don't say it. I don't want anyone but me.

subtitles.original: なんて ありえない
subtitles.english: That's impossible.

subtitles.original: アキロゼ生誕祭2023を見てくれてるみんな！
subtitles.english: Everyone watching the Akirose Birthday Festival 2023!

subtitles.original: 見えてる？聞こえてる？
subtitles.english: Can you see me? Can you hear me?

subtitles.original: アローナ！
subtitles.english: Alona!

subtitles.original: はぁ〜 やっと喋れる〜
subtitles.english: I can finally talk!

subtitles.original: もう... 今回盛りだくさんだったね
subtitles.english: There was so much in it this time, wasn't there?

subtitles.original: ということで、今回のライブは
subtitles.english: So, for this live performance...

subtitles.original: 昨年に引き続きまして
subtitles.english: Following on from last year,

subtitles.original: 大好きなオトスタプロジェクトさんの
subtitles.english: from the beloved Otosta Project,

subtitles.original: 『オズの魔法使い』のミュージカルを
subtitles.english: a musical of "The Wizard of Oz"

subtitles.original: やらせていただきました！
subtitles.english: I performed it for you!

subtitles.original: 素敵な曲をありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for the wonderful songs!

subtitles.original: そして、今回のライブにぴったりな
subtitles.english: And perfect for this live performance,

subtitles.original: ステージセットを こんなに可愛く作ってもらいました！
subtitles.english: the stage set was made so cute like this!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: It's super cute, right?

subtitles.original: ぜひね、アーカイブとかでも
subtitles.english: Please, even in the archive,

subtitles.original: じっくり色んなところ見てくれたら
subtitles.english: take a good look at all the details.

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ制作陣も喜びます！
subtitles.english: The production team will be so happy!

subtitles.original: もちろん、アキロゼも喜びます！
subtitles.english: And of course, Akirose will be happy too!

subtitles.original: ぜひね、そんな感想とかもいっぱい見たいので
subtitles.english: I really want to see all your thoughts and comments.

subtitles.original: 今日の配信の感想や、可愛いスクショ
subtitles.english: Comments on today's stream, cute screenshots,

subtitles.original: 短い動画とか、GIF、ギフ？などなど
subtitles.english: short videos, GIFs, and so on.

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグをつけていっぱいツイートしてください！
subtitles.english: Please tweet a lot with the hashtag!

subtitles.original: アキロゼめっちゃ巡回します！見ます！よろしくね！
subtitles.english: Akirose will be checking them all out! I'll see them! Thanks!

subtitles.original: このハッシュタグはこちら！
subtitles.english: The hashtag is right here!

subtitles.original: これ付けると見やすいので、ぜひぜひ付けてください！
subtitles.english: It makes them easy to find, so please use it!

subtitles.original: YouTubeのコメントもよろしくね〜！
subtitles.english: And please leave comments on YouTube too!
